## PopulatableProtocol.withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw DebtToken from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedTransactionInterface<P, SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>>>;
```

**Returns:**

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [ProtocolToken reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.protocoltokenreward.md)<!-- -->.
